data.actual_result: Drag and drop interface does not show up; Spotify Embed turns dark and stops working; Images will be clipped on top of the embed, while audio files start automatically playing within the embed.
data.expected_result: File is uploaded as usual; nothing happens to the Spotify Embed.
data.short_description: Drag to upload doesn't work over Spotify Embeds
data.steps_to_repro: - Select any file (special things happen with images and audio files, but anything works.) - In any text channel, send a Spotify playlist link to bring up a Spotify Embed. - Drag file and drop over Spotify Embed. - Observe. Note that once the drag and drop interface comes up, this no longer happens.
